FuncDef: This command defines the clocking mode on the specified CMA/MDA. This command is only supported on CES CMAs and MDAs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that MDA is in the adaptive clock mode. This CMA/MDA can use adaptive clock recovery methods.
Specifies that MDA is in the differential clock mode. This CMA/MDA can use differential clock recovery methods.

Sets the differential timestamp frequency to be 103.68 MHz (default), 77,76 MhZ or 19.44 MHz. The frequency value is entered in kHz, thus valid values are 103680, 77760 and 19440. If this parameter is omitted, the default timestamp frequency of 103.68 MHz is used. Values-19440, 77760, 103680.
